Five Stars
review:
Best smart phone.... Best in performance... Camera is above average but u have
all the ability to control the camera like iso, shutter speed and so on in the
pro mode which will bring out a great shot.... It is damn fast... All the
applications you through on it, it can slice through easily. Face lock "OMG"
It's insanely fast... And the dash charger will quickly charge. I will keep my
phone to charge in the morning the charge will be around 30% and when I come
back it will be full, no need to worry about the battery life. It lasts me a
day with one full charge.... Finally talking about the design and display...
It is very sleek and fits in the hand perfectly... When u hold the u can feel
the slimness of the phone.... It's that hot phone... With the 18:9 ratio
display it makes the phone perfect with it's price tag of 33k. Hence it is
damn good... The best phone... Especially for college students

It's a very good mobile phone. Fast and good screen. Design is elegant. But..
the sound quality is poor for both inbuilt speaker and WiFi speaker. I've
installed Dolby program but didn't change much. I hope this will be improved
soon.

Best phone ever.. Screen looks fantastic and phone is a beast in performance.

One plus is rocking

No words to tell, awesome mobile thanku Amazon for launching this mobile
through ur website 😊

Everything is nice except the look. Design is not up to the expectation for a
phone cost 33k

Received the product in a day..( I live in Bangalore )  
Unlike the other boxes being damaged, mine was very good...  
  
***-Box contents-***  
  
Before starting...  
I would like (love) to say that the unboxing of this product is the
bbbbbbbbest.....  
You will just LOVE the way they packed the things and... You'll just love
it...  
  
Slowly opening the top box, we have our PHONE with the best look sitting there
intact...  
  
Under that we have quick start guide in a transparent phone case.. We can find
a coupon in the quick start guide..  
  
Bellow that we have the dash charger and the USB type c wire.  
  
***-PHONE-***  
  
1.DISPLAY  
  
BELIEVE ME... you WILL LOVE this display..  
The THIN BEZELS make you feel goooood ( great )  
You will be given a pre-applied screen protector with  
the phone..  
  
2\. SOUND  
  
Though it has a single speaker...the sound quality and the intensity is
great..  
BUT....  
When you play a game or watching a video horizontally, you could be covering
the speaker and it is BAD....  
You can resolve this by using a headphone or rotating the screen the other way
around...  
Hope this helps..  
  
3.BATTERY  
  
Mmmmmm.....  
Battery iiiiis goood  
BUT.....  
If you're playing games intensively, then this could drain the battery....  
But nothing to worry..... It is only if you're a heavy gamer....  
  
AAAAAAND.......NOOW.....  
  
Even if you're an intense gamer....  
DON'T WORRY....  
  
THE DASH CHARGING IS THE FASTEST  
IT IS SOO FAST....that it  
CHARGED MY 9% battery to 94% in 23 minutes.....  
  
And  
  
THE PHONE DOESN'T HEAT AT AAALL...  
Though it gets a bit WARM ( If you know what warm means ) it doesn't bother at
all...  
  
And tha AMAZING PART is that the DASH CHARGER doesn't heat a litttttttle bit
also....  
Pretty impressive I should say...  
  
We can call this  
***THE FLASH CHARGER***  
  
BUT.....  
  
4.CAMERA  
  
As a photographer, I never liked portrait mode or depth mode on phones for one
single reason....  
They make it look like they give a bokeh effect...  
But as the technology of these cameras are also changing, they're getting
better at that artificial bokeh...  
  
OnePlus 5T has a second camera which has an aperture of f/1.7 which means it
gives  
a) Very good looking bokeh effect  
b) Allows more light... which means...  
VERY GOOD IN LOW LIGHTING CONDITIONS  
  
But OnePlus 5T's second camera is no longer dedicated for telephoto purpose...
Instead, it uses the secondary camera for low lighting purposes and advanced
depth mode.  
  
Though it doesn't do that well in a), it EXCELLS in b)  
  
I've tested the camera in very low lighting areas and it is a very very very
good camera for low lighting photography...  
  
I'll be testing and updating this review again after a while...  
  
5.PERFORMANCE  
  
\--------> BE(A)ST <\--------  
  
GAMING...  
  
I've played some heavy games like  
Mortal kombat x  
Asphalt 8  
Hitman sniper  
Modern Combat  
N.O.V.A  
....etc. (Please do suggest any other Heavy games I should test)  
and it has  
+NOOO FRAME DROP AT ALL  
+DOESN't HEAT AT ALL  
+SMOOOTH AND HIGHLY ENJOYABLE GAMEPLAY  
  
-BATTERY MIGHT DRAIN FAST...(DEPENDS)  
-IF YOU'RE NOT USING HEADPHONE, YOU SHOULD HOLD THE PHONE ONLY IN ONE WAY TO LISTEN TO THE SOUNDS OF THE GAMES  
  
RAM MANAGEMENT AND SPEED  
  
EXCELLENT EXCELLENT EXCELLENT  
  
DONE...  
  
6\. FINGERPRINT SCANNER AND FACE ID  
  
SINGLE WORD FOR BOTH OF THEM...  
FASTEST  
Though the Face id takes time to set up....  
It is accurate and fast..  
One suggestion... Don't move your face too much when the phone is scanning
your face...  
Try to look at the camera and stand in a place so that your face appears to be
bright (under a light..etc.)  
  
*****************************************************  
  
I'll be updating this review again and cover all the aspects after testing and
using this phone for a while..  
  
To avoid the battery drain..  
Don't charge your phone upto 100%  
And don't completely use it to 0%  
  
Hope this review is helpful..  
Please do click the helpful option if this review was helpful..  
  
Thanks.

The best looks , Awesome Camera, Seriously is a flagship killer, Superfast
charging.

Fantastic

Lovely phone, worth the price and valuable. Thanks Amazon.
